Text.Page:
After the Vault of Oriyn incident, all forces of Highwatch gathered to do their best to find Verikam and protect the city.

This reduced the number of soldiers who could fight the demokron surge, leading to help the baraka.

You are the one Omeros spoke of!

Heading to the Havenstone Ruins? I have a request of you.

With everyone seeking High Elder Verikam, our forces are stretched thin, and we cannot patrol the road as we should.

If you can kill demokrons on the way to Qeldar Station, we will reward you."I'll do what I can."

Ah! Yes, you are , the visitor from the south.

Thank you for helping us."I hope what I am doing is helping."
